title: "Mages should get have more ap" -mage mains
body: Ok sure but we will need to take away your cdr then :^)

replies.body:
The thing is that mages should be able to choose instead of having both or none.

Riot seems to be pretty dense about it. I have always mained mages since I was there (I leveled to 30 with Mordekaiser while I was discovering Xerath who I mained from S3 until Aurelion Sol release) and I noticed that no matter the patch/season I had no choices about the build. I experimented a bit with the mage update building Tear on Xerath but once again i was forced into Morello because all of the slef sustain and heals introduced a bit later.

What mages need are different choices about builds nd not more powerful items.

Not to mention that Rod of Ages gives as much AP as Morellonomicon.

Lets use Xerath as an example.

A competent Xerath will never build {{item:3027}} because he should never be the one taking hits and having more mana doesn't accomplish much since his passive is a fixed value. Tear into {{item:3003}} seems good (I was building it) but then every1 and their mothers got self sustain which meant you either build Morello or you wait your ADC to build the last item to counter them.

Different mages have different builds, Swain or Aurelion Sol without {{item:3027}} or {{item:3030}} respectively have no reason to exist and the only freedom you have is to chose which item to build before the others.

Xerath also has little use for the hextech items because he shouldn't be that close.  Same with Abyssal and Zhonya's (unless you need protection from assassins).

Wow there are soooo many choices! /s

Claiming that a competent person playing a champion will never take damage is stupid since the people they will face on the enemy team is supposed to be matched made with similar skill to that person. you can try to avoid damage but people who perfectly avoid getting damaged all the time are usually the ones running when their front like is fighting putting out no use in their kit and useing 2/0/0 (thats right i actually give assists some weight) score to justify how good they are.

I'm not saying that he is never taking damage but he shouldn't build expecting to tank much of it and instead he should focus to delete ppl off map which isn't achieved by building a high number (aka 2+) of hp/mr/armor items.

I didnt put any mr or armor items even though zhyonas is a staple on mages and hp gives you just as ap as non hp builds so why go for less surviability for the same damage not to mention if you want more damage seraphs embrace cant be beat as a single ap item on any champion with mana  only rabadons beats it when you have more ap to stack with it which when you have seraphs embrace and other top ap items cant be beat again.
